message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1100000. I believe this is a fair price, considering its value to you. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your offer, but I think the product is worth less to me than you do. I'm willing to pay $900000 for it. Can you consider my offer?

Bob, I understand your perspective.  While I appreciate your offer, I'm not able to accept it at this time.  I'm willing to come down to $950000.  This still leaves room for profit for both of us.  Let me know if you're interested in moving forward with this price.
I appreciate your willingness to come down on the price. However, I'm still not comfortable paying $950000. I'm willing to pay $920000 for the product. Can you consider my offer?
